The First Procurement & Logistics Hub in MENA for the Energy, Chemical and Industrial Sectors

About Us

Unlock valuable insights and data-driven reports to gain a deeper understanding of trends and opportunities in your industry

Learn More

Our Vision

To become the leading supply chain service provider for the energy, chemical, and industrial sectors in KSA and the wider MENA region.

Our Mission

To provide reliable, world-class end-to-end supply chain services, creating value for companies in the energy, chemical, and industrial sectors in KSA and the wider MENA region.

Advancing Saudi Vision 2030

ASMO plays a role in realizing Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030. We are committed to driving the Kingdom’s economic diversification and industrial growth, aiming to establish a transportation and logistics hub that transcends local boundaries and emerges as a regional leader with global aspirations.

As a leading end-to-end supply chain partner, ASMO empowers the local private sector, including SMEs, through initiatives that drive economic growth and create employment opportunities. We are dedicated to strengthening the Kingdom's supply chain resilience by actively participating in the IKTVA program.

Building Sustainable Communities

Our mission extends beyond business—we strive to transform business practices to provide sustainable employment opportunities and protect the environment. Focusing on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) aspects, we develop and retain our employees, uphold the highest standards of corporate governance, and integrate principles of the circular economy.

Solutions

We combine industry expertise with advanced technology to deliver solutions that meet the evolving needs of the energy, chemical, and industrial sectors.

Learn More

Supply & Demand Planning

ASMO strives for a seamless harmonization of all master data elements across all ecosystem participants, powered by future-proof technologies enabling integrated demand-planning and forecasting through aggregating inputs from participating companies.

Supplier Management

We serve as the central hub for accessing an optimized, well-managed, and disciplined supplier base. It facilitates sustainable procurement decisions including sourcing and international supply chain design through intuitive, automated technology, and processes tailored to meet the demands of its customers.

Sourcing & Procurement

We specialize in consolidated sourcing procurement of materials services from domestic international suppliers. This service includes catalog management, harmonization standardization, streamlined procure-to-pay processes, tailored to enhance efficiency cost-effectiveness for customers. By optimizing these processes, ASMO ensures supply needs are met promptly with precision, supporting seamless operations across industries.

Inventory Management

We integrate innovative solutions to manage and optimize inventory. Its approach ensures efficient storage, reduces excess inventory, and streamlines the flow of goods. Through advanced technology and data integration, ASMO provides real-time visibility and control over inventory levels, enabling strategic decision-making, reducing obsolescence, and improving operational efficiency.

Control Tower

Our Control Tower offers comprehensive visibility and control over the end-to-end supply chain. By integrating predictive analytics and real-time data, the Control Tower enhances decision-making and operational efficiency. It allows for proactive management of supply chain activities, identifying potential disruptions before they occur, and ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.

Logistics Contractor Management

We collaborate with a network of supply chain partners to seamlessly deliver value to customers. By managing logistics contractors, ASMO ensures efficient, reliable, and safe operations, as well as contributing to sustainable in-country value.

Reclamation Management

We offer comprehensive reclamation services for obsolete inventory, including repair, refurbishment, recycling, returning to suppliers, and responsible waste disposal. This service is designed to maximize value from reverse supply chain activities, supporting a circular economy and reducing environmental impacts.

e-Marketplace

Our B2B e-Marketplace simplifies the purchasing process by connecting multiple suppliers and customers seamlessly. The state-of-the-art platform allows for efficient and transparent transactions with just the click of a button, enhancing connectivity and collaboration across the supply chain. This solution ensures that procurement needs are met efficiently and effectively.

Supply Chain & Logistics Managed Services

We meticulously plan, manage, and execute comprehensive end-to-end supply chain solutions, ensuring the seamless movement of materials from vendors to end customers. Covering aspects such as inbound transportation, storage, and distribution, ASMO operates as a fourth-party logistics provider (4PL), optimizing logistics to achieve maximum efficiency and resilience across the supply chain.

Our Principles of Success

Empowering individuals to drive innovation with courage, passion, and purpose

Learn More

Teamwork

We are an empowered team, driven by passion and a 'Dare to Lead' attitude

We believe in the power of each individual. We encourage our people to take initiative, embrace challenges, and drive innovation. We prioritize the well-being and safety of our team and empower them to lead with courage and confidence. Our passionate and motivated employees are essential to our success, with each person playing a role in shaping our future & building our community.

Integrity

We build on a foundation of shared trust

Integrity is at the heart of everything we do. It is the quality of being honest and showing a consistent and uncompromising adherence to strong moral and ethical principles and values. We believe that being open, honest, and transparent is crucial for building trust. Our commitment to integrity ensures that every action we take is responsible and trustworthy, forming the foundation of our relationships and success.

Respect

We Respect & Value Every Link in the Chain

We believe that without respect, there is no link, no chain, and no success. Our success depends on the strength of every link in our chain. If one link is broken, the entire chain is compromised. Our commitment to respect extends from the environment to our people, customers, and suppliers, ensuring that each link is valued and supported.

Accountability

We are accountable in owning our actions and results

We take full responsibility for our actions and outcomes. We believe in owning our decisions and their impacts, ensuring that we deliver on our promises and maintain the trust of our partners and clients

Customer Centric

Our customers are at the core of every link in our chain

We recognize that our internal and external customers are the foundation of our success. We aim to understand their end-to-end needs, build strong relationships, and consistently provide value. By focusing on our customers, we strive to make each link in our supply chain operate seamlessly, driving efficiency, reliability, and mutual growth.

Excellence

We strive for excellence in everything we do, prioritizing safety at every step

We define excellence as delivering the highest standards while ensuring the safety of our team and partners. We are committed to being industry pioneers, continuously improving and innovating to stay ahead. We aim is to shape tomorrow's supply chain with world-class, reliable, efficient, and sustainable services. By embedding safe practices at our core, we consistently deliver high-quality results.
